spec.description:
A companion dashboard for https://github.com/hipages/php-fpm_exporter

The dashboard caters to Kubernetes & PHP-FPM but can be easily adjusted.

panels.description: Utilisation of processes based on active/inactive processes

targets.expr: sum(phpfpm_active_processes{app="$app", pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace"}) * 100 / sum(phpfpm_total_processes{app="$app", pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace"})
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

panels.title: Total Process Utilisation

panels.description: How many times was the maximum amount of children reached?
panels.title: Max Children reached

targets.expr: sum by(pod) (phpfpm_active_processes{app="$app", pod=~"$pod"}) * 100 / sum by(pod) (phpfpm_total_processes{app="$app", pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace"})
